parm.label: URL for Glossary
parm.description: The URL for the LO glossary button.

parm.label: Show LO Glossary Button
parm.description: Show LO Glossary button (true or false)

parm.label: Left Quote Image
parm.description: Image of a left quote used in Quote content type

parm.label: Right Quote Image
parm.description: Image of a right quote used in Quote content type

parm.label: Image for Review Button
parm.description: Image for review button

parm.label: Student Info Image Upload
parm.description: Allow students to upload their own image

parm.label: Category Borders
parm.description: Boolean value;determines if side borders will be displayed.

parm.label: Category Bottom Border
parm.description: Accepts graphic or color;creates bottom border for the category.

parm.label: Home Page Title
parm.description: Title of portal window (in the title bar of browser)

parm.label: Default Assessment Link
parm.description: If set to true, displays prescription page first

parm.label: Show Student Sign Out
parm.description: Change to add or remove the sign out button from the student inf

parm.label: Category Border Color
parm.description: Sets the color for category borders, when border is set to true

parm.label: Table Color
parm.description: Category and table background color

parm.label: Table Header Background Color
parm.description: Color of the background color in the header table

parm.label: Table Body Color
parm.description: Table body color

parm.label: Missing Student Image
parm.description: Image to display if no student image available

parm.label: Image Caption Style - Presentation
parm.description: Style for Image content type caption in presentation

parm.label: Presentation Title Page Style
parm.description: Style for presentation title page

parm.label: Parameter Desc Text Style
parm.description: Style of Parameter content type description text in presentation

parm.label: Parameter Heading Text Style
parm.description: Style of Parameter content type text in presentation

parm.label: Parameter Heading Style
parm.description: Style of Parameter content type, title in presentation

parm.label: Small Black Text
parm.description: Style for text of additional info (ex. TOC)
parm.value: color: red; text-decoration: none; font:8pt verdana; vertical-align: top; text-align: left;

parm.label: Small Blue Text
parm.description: Style for bulleted text (ex. TOC)
parm.value: color: #000000; text-decoration: none; cursor: hand; font:8pt verdana; font-weight: bold; vertical-align: top;

parm.label: Small Left Text
parm.description: Style for date of last access in Personal Info category
parm.value: color: #00ff00; text-decoration: none; cursor: hand; font:9pt verdana; font-weight: bold;vertical-align: top; text-align: left;

parm.label: Report Status Style
parm.description: Sets the status style of a report header.
parm.value: color: #000000; text-decoration: none; font:bold 8pt verdana; vertical-align: top;; text-transform: none; background-color: #CCFFFF

parm.label: Style for Inactive Tabs
parm.description: Sets the font style of inactive tab
parm.value: color: white; text-decoration: none; cursor: hand; font: 8pt Arial; font-weight:bold; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF;

parm.label: Style for Active Tabs
parm.description: Sets the font style of active tab
parm.value: color: #FFFFFF; font-size:12pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight:bold; text-decoration: none;
